about_the_game:
The Official Cosmic Shake Costume Pack, including 7 additional SpongeBob costumes! Pizza glide as Opposite Day Bob or karate kick as Band Geek while you make your way through this brand-new SpongeBob adventure.

Included in the Costume Pack:
  • RoboBob SteelPants
  • Mermaid Man Bob
  • Purple Sponge
  • Primitive Sponge
  • Dried Sponge
  • Opposite Day Bob
  • Band Geek
detailed_description:
The Official Cosmic Shake Costume Pack, including 7 additional SpongeBob costumes! Pizza glide as Opposite Day Bob or karate kick as Band Geek while you make your way through this brand-new SpongeBob adventure.

Included in the Costume Pack:
  • RoboBob SteelPants
  • Mermaid Man Bob
  • Purple Sponge
  • Primitive Sponge
  • Dried Sponge
  • Opposite Day Bob
  • Band Geek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 925 / Intel Pentium Dual Core G3320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 380 / Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
